returns.summary: You can return most items within 30 days of delivery in original condition.
steps: Go to Your Orders and select the item.
Choose a return reason and preferred method.
Print the prepaid label and drop the package off.

refunds.summary: Refunds are issued to your original payment method.
refunds.timeline: 5–10 business days after we receive your return.
refunds.method: Original payment method or store credit if applicable.

shipping.summary: We ship domestically and internationally with reliable carriers.
shipping.domestic: Standard 3–5 business days; Express 1–2 business days.
shipping.international: Varies by destination, typically 7–14 business days.
shipping.free_threshold: Free shipping on domestic orders over $50.
